Feel free to Contact Us

Keep in touch with us anytime[/cz_title][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_100670"]If you know of a safety or abuse problem with any of Xtra's services, we'd like to hear about it right away.Look for the Chat icon on the right side of your browser. We are online 24/7. If you dont see it, were just busy helping other customers. Check back again.[br][br]

  • Emergency call: +1 (818) 2345 67
  • Twitter account: @xtra_theme
  • Facebook account: @xtratheme

About Our Charity

Help build a foundation of charitable giving for your children[/cz_title][cz_gap][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_50803" sk_overall="padding-right:55px;RTLpadding-right:0;padding-left:80px;RTL"]Every year, in lieu of a Christmas present, my mother gives my partner, my three stepchildren, and me a set amount of money to donate to the charity or good cause of our individual choice. I think this gesture of my mother's embodies the true spirit of giving, and to me is more meaningful and lasting more than any of material gift. It has helped to generate discussion with the children about causes, has encouraged the two older ones to make regular charitable donations of their own.[/cz_title][cz_gap What We Do?

We tend to make our world a safer place for people[/cz_title][cz_gap height="60px" height_tablet="10px"][cz_tabs fx="cz_tabs_flash" id="cz_105857" sk_row="border-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.12);" sk_active="color:#dec09c;border-style:solid;border-bottom-width:1px;border-color:#dec09c;" sk_tabs="font-size:18px;color:#606060;font-weight:700;margin-right:40px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:40px;RTL" sk_row_tablet="margin-right:0px;" sk_con="padding-right:60px;RTLpadding-right:0px;padding-left:60px;RTL" sk_con_tablet="padding-right:0px;padding-left:0px;" sk_tabs_hover="color:#332e29;" cz_tabs=""][cz_tab title="Agriculture & Food" id="cz_70745"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_16087"]The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning.Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.Pray for the dead. And fight like hell for the living![/cz_title][cz_button title="LEARN MORE" icon_position="after" text_effect="cz_btn_show_hidden_icon" id="cz_37691" sk_button="padding:8px 30px;margin-top:50px;border-radius:100px;" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fxtratheme.com%2Fcharity%2Fcauses%2F|title:Events||" icon="fa czico-188-arrows-2" sk_hover="box-shadow:0px 10px 50px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);"][/cz_tab][cz_tab title="Education & Clothing" id="cz_15425"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_50376"]If you haven't any charity in your heart, You have the worst kind of heart trouble.Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.The work of volunteers impacts on all our lives, Even if we are not aware of it.[/cz_title][cz_stylish_list id="cz_107186" items="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Adult%20Education%20Program%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Early%20Childhood%20Program%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Education%20Policy%20Reform%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Special%20Educations%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%5D" sk_overall="margin-top:50px;" default_icon="fa czico-072-check-mark" sk_lists="font-size:18px;color:#332e29;font-weight:500;width:50%;margin-bottom:19px;float:left;RTLfloat:right;RTL" sk_icons="font-size:18px;color:#dec09c;background-color:#332e29;padding:5px;margin-right:20px;border-radius:99px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:20px;RTL" sk_lists_mobile="width:100%;"][/cz_tab][cz_tab title="Provide clean water" id="cz_98534"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_49292" sk_overall="padding-bottom:50px;" sk_overall_mobile="padding-bottom:20px;"]We invest in local solutions to the local water crisis in sub-Saharan Africa. We provide clean water.In order to help the communities we have created a group of farmers who donate agricultural product to food banks.[/cz_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cz_title icon_before_type="image" text_center="true" id="cz_91808" image_as_icon="1499" sk_overall="line-height:1.4;" sk_icon_before="margin-right:20px;margin-bottom:-8px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:20px;RTL" sk_icon_before_mobile="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:20px;margin-left:0px;" sk_overall_mobile="margin-bottom:25px;" sk_icon_before_hover="CDVZtransform:scale(1.1);CDVZ"]

Saving The World

United States, Memphis[/cz_title][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][cz_title icon_before_type="image" text_center="true" id="cz_102213" image_as_icon="1500" sk_overall="line-height:1.4;" sk_icon_before="margin-bottom:-8px;" sk_icon_before_mobile="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:20px;margin-left:0px;" sk_icon_before_hover="CDVZtransform:scale(1.1);CDVZ"]

Join Our Mailing Group & Get Updates

[/cz_title][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_subscribe placeholder="Type your e-mail address ..." btn_title="Subscribe Now" id="cz_57802" sk_overall="width:100%;" sk_button="color:#dec09c;background-color:#332e29;margin-top:10px;margin-right:10px;margin-left:10px;" sk_button_hover="color:#332e29;background-color:#dec09c;" sk_input="color:#383838;padding:20px 30px;border-radius:100px;box-shadow:0px 10px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);" sk_button_mobile="margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;display:table;" sk_input_mobile="font-size:14px;padding-top:15px;padding-bottom:15px;" cz_subscribe=""][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][cz_gap height="5px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cz_gap height="150px" height_tablet="60px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cz_title id="cz_70938"]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
